alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Frenchman Basin; Loess Plains; Loup Rivers Basin; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest; Sandhills, Valentine NWR, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 07 at 2:40AM CDT until September 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY, GUSTY WINDS, AND LIGHTNING FOR WESTERN AND NORTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Fire Weather Watch for low humidity, gusty winds, and lightning, which is in effect Thursday from late morning through early evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR, Fire Weather Zone 206 Sandhills/Valentine NWR/Nebraska National Forest, Fire Weather Zone 208 Niobrara Valley/Fort Niobrara NWR/Samuel R McKelvie National Forest, Fire Weather Zone 209 Loup Rivers Basin, Fire Weather Zone 210 Frenchman Basin and Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * TIMING...Thursday 11 AM to 8 PM CDT. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. Winds transition to northwesterly across northwest Nebraska during the afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 to 15 percent across western Nebraska and 15 to 20 percent for central Nebraska. * TEMPERATURES...Highs near 100. * LIGHTNING...Thunderstorm chances increase during the evening hours across northwest Nebraska, then spread to the rest of the forecast area during the night. Dry lightning is possible. * IMPACTS...Any fire start may be capable of spreading rapidly and exhibiting extreme behavior.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Frenchman Basin; Loess Plains; Loup Rivers Basin; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest; Sandhills, Valentine NWR, Nebraska National Forest
